metadata.title: CVE-2024-40971 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS-updates 18.04 LTS (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:f2fs: remove clear SB_INLINECRYPT flag in default_optionsIn f2fs_remount, SB_INLINECRYPT flag will be clear and re-set.If create new file or open file during this gap, these fileswill not use inlinecrypt. Worse case, it may lead to datacorruption if wrappedkey_v0 is enable.Thread A:                               Thread B:-f2fs_remount				-f2fs_file_open or f2fs_new_inode  -default_options	<- clear SB_INLINECRYPT flag                                          -fscrypt_select_encryption_impl  -parse_options	<- set SB_INLINECRYPT again
